TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemEvents extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对系统事件通知的访问。

span.span: Provides access to system event notifications.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对特定类型的系统事件做出响应的能力。The class provides the ability to respond to specific types of system events. 当引发系统事件时，使用的系统事件的线程，用于监视称为任何委托附加到该事件。When a system event is raised, any delegates attached to the event are called using the thread that monitors for system events. 因此，你应使从在事件处理程序线程安全的任何调用。Therefore, you should make any calls from your event handlers thread-safe. 如果你需要调用不作为此类的成员公开的系统事件，则可以使用方法。If you need to call a system event that is not exposed as a member of this class, you can use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 不要引发系统事件处理程序，因为它可能会阻止其他应用程序的正常运行的线程上执行耗时的处理。Do not perform time-consuming processing on the thread that raises a system event handler because it might prevent other applications from functioning. > [!NOTE] > 某些系统事件可能不会引发上[!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]。Some system events might not be raised on [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]. 请务必验证你的应用程序上按预期工作[!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]。Be sure to verify that your application works as expected on [!INCLUDE[windowsver](~/includes/windowsver-md.md)]. ## Examples 本部分包含两个示例。This section contains two examples. 第一个示例演示如何使用普通的应用程序中的系统事件和第二个示例演示如何使用 Windows 服务中的系统事件。The first example shows how to use system events in an ordinary application, and the second example shows how to use system events in a Windows service. **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的代码示例注册某些系统事件感兴趣，然后等待任何这些事件发生。The following code example registers interest in some system events and then waits for any of those events to occur. 如果用户更改显示分辨率，则会发生所示的输出。The output shown occurs if the user changes the display resolution. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的代码示例演示一个非常简单的 Windows 服务处理和事件。The following code example demonstrates a very simple Windows service that handles the and events. 该示例包含一个名为服务`SimpleService`，名为窗体`HiddenForm`，和一个安装程序。The example includes a service named `SimpleService`, a form named `HiddenForm`, and an installer. 该窗体提供所需的系统事件的消息循环。The form provides the message loop that is required by system events. > [!NOTE] > 服务没有消息循环时，除非他们权与桌面交互。Services do not have message loops, unless they are allowed to interact with the desktop. 如果隐藏窗体不提供消息循环，如本示例中，必须本地系统帐户下运行服务并启用与桌面的交互所需的手动干预。If the message loop is not provided by a hidden form, as in this example, the service must be run under the local system account, and manual intervention is required to enable interaction with the desktop. 管理员必须手动检查，即**允许服务与桌面交互**上的复选框**Log On**选项卡的服务属性对话框。That is, the administrator must manually check the **Allow service to interact with desktop** check box on the **Log On** tab of the service properties dialog box. 在这种情况下，会自动提供一个消息循环。In that case, a message loop is automatically provided. 仅当本地系统帐户下运行服务时，此选项才可用。This option is available only when the service is run under the local system account. 不能以编程方式启用与桌面的交互。Interaction with the desktop cannot be enabled programmatically. 在此示例在服务启动运行的实例的线程`HiddenForm`。The service in this example starts a thread that runs an instance of `HiddenForm`. 将事件挂钩，并在窗体中处理。The events are hooked up and handled in the form. 必须在窗体，以确定已首先; 完全加载窗体的 load 事件挂接事件否则不会引发事件。The events must be hooked up in the load event of the form, to make sure that the form is completely loaded first; otherwise the events will not be raised. > [!NOTE] > 该示例提供所有必要的代码，包括通常由 Visual Studio 设计器生成的窗体初始化代码。The example provides all the necessary code, including the form initialization code typically generated by Visual Studio designers. 如果你正在开发你的服务在 Visual Studio 中，可以省略第二个分部类并使用**属性**窗口设置的高度和宽度为零，该边框样式的隐藏窗体，和的窗口状态.If you are developing your service in Visual Studio, you can omit the second partial class and use the **Properties** window to set the height and width of the hidden form to zero, the border style to , and the window state to . 若要运行示例：To run the example: 1. 编译命令行中的代码。Compile the code from the command line. 用于源文件的名称并不重要。The name that you use for the source file is not important. 2. 从命令行中使用安装服务[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)实用程序。Install the service from the command line using the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) utility. 例如，`InstallUtil example.exe`源代码文件名称是否`example.cs`或`example.vb`。For example, `InstallUtil example.exe` if the source file name is `example.cs` or `example.vb`. 必须是管理员才能安装该服务。You must be an administrator to install the service. 3. 使用服务控制台启动该服务。Use the Services console to start the service. 4. 更改系统时间，或更改用户首选项，如鼠标属性。Change the system time, or change user preferences, such as mouse properties. 5. 查看中的消息**应用程序**类别的事件查看器。View the messages in the **Application** category of Event Viewer. 6. 使用服务控制台停止服务。Use the Services console to stop the service. 7. 通过从命令行卸载服务`/u`选项。Uninstall the service from the command line by using the `/u` option. 例如 `InstallUtil /u example.exe`。For example, `InstallUtil /u example.exe`. [!code-csharp[ManagedWindowsService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ManagedWindowsService/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ManagedWindowsService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ManagedWindowsService/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: .
Associated state:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig native int CreateTimer(int32 interval) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateTimer (interval As Integer) As IntPtr

param.name: interval
param.span: 指定计时器通知之间的间隔（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Specifies the interval between timer notifications, in milliseconds.

summary.span: 创建一个与系统事件窗口相关联的新窗口计时器。

span.span: Creates a new window timer associated with the system events window.
The ID of the new timer.

exception.span: 间隔小于或等于零。

span.span: The interval is less than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功，或创建计时器的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed, or the attempt to create the timer did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event DisplaySettingsChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户更改显示设置时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the display settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何监视事件。The following code example demonstrates how to monitor the event. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#2)]

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event EventsThreadShutdown As EventHandler

summary.span: 在侦听系统事件的线程终止前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the thread that listens for system events is terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为侦听系统事件的线程即将终止，将引发此事件。This event is raised as the thread that listens for system events is about to be terminated. 使用侦听系统事件的线程调用系统事件委托。System event delegates are invoked using the thread that listens for system events. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

summary.span: 当用户在系统中添加或移除字体时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user adds fonts to or removes fonts from the system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void InvokeOnEventsThread(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Shared Sub InvokeOnEventsThread (method As Delegate)

param.name: method
param.span: 要使用侦听系统事件的线程调用的委托。

span.span: A delegate to invoke using the thread that listens for system events.

summary.span: 使用侦听系统事件的线程调用指定的委托。

span.span: Invokes the specified delegate using the thread that listens for system events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法需要处理的系统事件由否则不公开任何时间类。You can use this method any time that you need to handle a system event that is not exposed otherwise by the class. 当调用此方法时，将由你的应用程序使用来处理系统事件的线程调用指定的委托。When you call this method, the specified delegate will be invoked by the thread that your application is using to process system events.

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

Public Shared Sub KillTimer (timerId As IntPtr)

param.name: timerId
param.span: 要终止的计时器的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the timer to terminate.

summary.span: 终止由给定 ID 指定的计时器。

span.span: Terminates the timer specified by the given id.

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功，或终止计时器的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed, or the attempt to terminate the timer did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event LowMemory As EventHandler

summary.span: 当系统用完可用 RAM 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the system is running out of available RAM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件包装 WM_COMPACTING 消息。This event wraps the WM_COMPACTING message. 当系统检测到多个 12.5 %30 到 60 秒间隔内的系统时间花费了压缩内存时，此消息发送给所有顶级窗口。This message is sent to all top-level windows when the system detects more than 12.5 percent of system time over a 30- to 60-second interval is being spent compacting memory. 这表明系统内存不足。This indicates that system memory is low. > [!NOTE] > 如果运行的消息泵，只被引发此事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服务中，除非使用隐藏的窗体或手动启动消息泵引发此事件将不会。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 有关演示如何通过使用 Windows 服务中的隐藏窗体处理系统事件的代码示例，请参阅类。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

para.span: 此消息仅用于使用 16 位基于 Windows 的应用程序兼容性。

span.span: This message is provided only for compatibility with 16-bit Windows-based applications.

summary.span: 当用户切换到使用其他调色板的应用程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user switches to an application that uses a different palette.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果运行的消息泵，只被引发此事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服务中，除非使用隐藏的窗体或手动启动消息泵引发此事件将不会。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 有关演示如何通过使用 Windows 服务中的隐藏窗体处理系统事件的代码示例，请参阅类。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何监视事件。The following code example demonstrates how to monitor the event. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#2)]

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event TimerElapsed As TimerElapsedEventHandler

summary.span: 在窗口计时器间隔过期时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a windows timer interval has expired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果运行的消息泵，只被引发此事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服务中，除非使用隐藏的窗体或手动启动消息泵引发此事件将不会。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 有关演示如何通过使用 Windows 服务中的隐藏窗体处理系统事件的代码示例，请参阅类。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

exception.span: 当前上下文不支持系统事件通知。

span.span: System event notifications are not supported under the current context.

exception.span: 例如，服务器进程可能不支持全局系统事件通知。

span.span: Server processes, for example, might not support global system event notifications.

exception.span: 创建系统事件窗口线程的尝试未成功。

span.span: The attempt to create a system events window thread did not succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event UserPreferenceChanged As UserPreferenceChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 在用户首选项更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user preference has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果运行的消息泵，只被引发此事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服务中，除非使用隐藏的窗体或手动启动消息泵引发此事件将不会。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 有关演示如何通过使用 Windows 服务中的隐藏窗体处理系统事件的代码示例，请参阅类。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event UserPreferenceChanging As UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户首选项更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user preference is changing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果运行的消息泵，只被引发此事件。This event is only raised if the message pump is running. 在 Windows 服务中，除非使用隐藏的窗体或手动启动消息泵引发此事件将不会。In a Windows service, unless a hidden form is used or the message pump has been started manually, this event will not be raised. 有关演示如何通过使用 Windows 服务中的隐藏窗体处理系统事件的代码示例，请参阅类。For a code example that shows how to handle system events by using a hidden form in a Windows service, see the class. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何监视事件。The following code example demonstrates how to monitor the event. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/cpp/SystemEvents.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/CS/SystemEvents.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemEvents/VB/SystemEvents.vb#2)]
